004import java.util.Scanner;
005import java.io.File;
006import java.io.PrintWriter;
007import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
008
009/**
010 * Moteur du jeu d'aventure
011 *
012 * @author Marie Emilienne Gnamien
013 * @version 15/03/2024
014 */
015public class GameEngine
016{
017    private UserInterface aGui;
018    private Parser aParser;
019    private Room aCurrentRoom;
020    private Stack<Room> aRoomStack;
021    
022    /**
023    * Constructeur du jeu où les pièces sont créées.
024    */
025    public GameEngine() {
026        this.createRooms();
027        this.aParser = new Parser();
028        this.aRoomStack = new Stack<Room>();
029    }//GameEngine()
030    
031    /**
032     * Création de l'interface et appel du message de bienvenue.
033     * @param pUserInterface UserInterface
034     */   
035    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
036    {
037        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
038        this.printWelcome();
039    }//setGUI()
040    
041    /**
042    *
043    * Affiche la pièce actuelle et les sorties possibles.
044    * 
045    */
046    private void printLocationInfo(){
047        this.aGui.println(aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
048        this.aGui.showImage(aCurrentRoom.getImageName());
049    }//printLocationInfo()
050
051    /**
052    *
053    * Affiche le message de bienvenue dès le lancement du jeu.
054    *
055    */
056    private void printWelcome(){
057    this.aGui.print("\n");
058    this.aGui.println("Welcome to 3417.");
059    this.aGui.print("\n");
060    this.aGui.println("Another day in this boring place..."); 
061    this.aGui.println("Grandpa asked me to help with stuff at the store today.");
062    this.aGui.println("\n");
063    this.aGui.println("Type 'help' if you need help."); 
064    this.aGui.print("\n");
065    if(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null){
066        this.aGui.showImage(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName());
067    }
068    }//printWelcome()
069    
070    /**
071    *
072    * Création de toutes les pièces du jeu.
073    */
074    private void createRooms() {
075        Room vConvenienceStore = new Room("at grandpa's convenience store","conveniencestore.jpg");
076        Room vStreet1 = new Room("in the first street","street1.jpg");
077        Room vStreet2 = new Room("in the Second street","street2.jpg");
078        Room vStreet3 = new Room("in the Third street","street3.jpg");
079        Room vRoom = new Room("in her room","bedroom.jpg");
080        Room vBasement = new Room("in the basement","basement.jpg");
081        Room vSecretWorkShop = new Room("at the Secret workshop","secretworkshop.jpg");
082        Room vBricABrac = new Room("at the bric-a-brac","bricabrac.jpg");
083        Room vTrainStation = new Room("at the Train Station","trainstation.jpg");
084        Room vPlatform = new Room("on the Platform","platform.jpg");
085        Room vSecretBasement = new Room("at the secret basement entrance","secretbasement.jpg");
086        Room vArena = new Room("in the arena","arena.jpg");
087        
088        Item vKeyCard = new Item("keyCard","keyCard - a transparent keycard made out of glass.", 5);
089        Item vBroom = new Item("broom","broom - an old and dusty broom.", 700);
090        Item vMilk = new Item("pack of milk"," pack of milk - \"fresh milk from your favorite laboratory !\" ",800);
091        Item vGums = new Item("gums", "a box of gums - \"for bad breath\" ", 100);
092        Item vArticulatedArmV1 = new Item("armV1","Articulated Arm V1 - \" based on a low technology quality \" ", 1250);
093        Item vPills = new Item("pills", "purple pills - \" do not consume these without a doctor's advice. \" ", 5);
094       
095        vSecretBasement.addItem("pills",vPills);
096        vBricABrac.addItem("armV1", vArticulatedArmV1);
097        
098        vConvenienceStore.addItem("gums",vGums);
099        vRoom.addItem("keyCard",vKeyCard);
100        vBasement.addItem("broom",vBroom);
101        vBasement.addItem("pack of milk", vMilk);
102        
103        vConvenienceStore.setExit("north",vStreet2);
104        vConvenienceStore.setExit("down", vBasement);
105        vConvenienceStore.setExit("south",vRoom);
106        vConvenienceStore.setExit("west",vStreet1);
107        vConvenienceStore.setExit("east",vStreet3);
108        
109        vStreet1.setExit("north", vBricABrac);
110        vStreet1.setExit("south", null);
111        vStreet1.setExit("west", null);
112        vStreet1.setExit("east", vConvenienceStore);
113        
114        vStreet2.setExit("north", null);
115        vStreet2.setExit("south", vConvenienceStore);
116        vStreet2.setExit("west", null);
117        vStreet2.setExit("east", null);
118        
119        vStreet3.setExit("north", null);
120        vStreet3.setExit("south", vTrainStation);
121        vStreet3.setExit("west", vConvenienceStore);
122        vStreet3.setExit("east", null);
123        
124
125        vRoom.setExit("north", vConvenienceStore);
126        vRoom.setExit("south", null);
127        vRoom.setExit("west", null);
128        vRoom.setExit("east", null);
129        
130        vBasement.setExit("north", null);
131        vBasement.setExit("south", null);
132        vBasement.setExit("west", null);
133        vBasement.setExit("up",vConvenienceStore);
134        vBasement.setExit("east", vSecretWorkShop);
135        
136        
137        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("north", null);
138        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("south", null);
139        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("west", vBasement);
140        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("east", null);
141        
142        vBricABrac.setExit("north", null);
143        vBricABrac.setExit("south", vStreet1);
144        vBricABrac.setExit("west", null);
145        vBricABrac.setExit("east", null);
146        
147        vTrainStation.setExit("north", vStreet3);
148        vTrainStation.setExit("south", vPlatform);
149        vTrainStation.setExit("west", null);
150        vTrainStation.setExit("east", null);      
151
152        vPlatform.setExit("north", vTrainStation);
153        vPlatform.setExit("south", null);
154        vPlatform.setExit("west", null);
155        vPlatform.setExit("east", vSecretBasement); 
156
157        vSecretBasement.setExit("north", null);
158        vSecretBasement.setExit("south", null);
159        vSecretBasement.setExit("west", vPlatform);
160        vSecretBasement.setExit("east", vArena); 
161        
162        vArena.setExit("north",null);
163        vArena.setExit("south",null);
164        vArena.setExit("west",vSecretBasement);
165        vArena.setExit("east",null);
166        
167        this.aCurrentRoom = vConvenienceStore;
168    }//createRooms()
169    
170        /**
171        *
172        * Affiche la description du lieu actuel.
173        */
174    private void look(){
175        this.aGui.println(aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
176    }//look()
177    
178        /**
179        *   Affiche un message dans la fenêtre lorsque l'utilisateur entre la commande eat 
180        * 
181        */
182    private void eat(){
183        this.aGui.println("You have eaten now and you are not hungry any more.");
184    }//eat()
185    
186        /**
187        * Permet de revenir dans la salle précédente une fois la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
188        */
189    private void back(){
190        if(!this.aRoomStack.empty()){
191        this.aCurrentRoom = this.aRoomStack.pop();
192        this.printLocationInfo();
193        }
194        else{
195            this.aGui.println("You can't go back...");
196        return;
197        }
198    }//back()
199    
200    /**
201     * Permet de lire le fichier texte mis en paramètre
202     * @param pTextFichier fichier texte
203     */
204    private void lecture(final String pTextFichier){
205        Scanner vSc;
206        boolean vVerif = false;
207        try{
208        vSc = new Scanner(new File(pTextFichier));
209        while(vSc.hasNextLine()){
210            vVerif = false;
211            String vLigne = vSc.nextLine();
212            this.interpretCommand(vLigne);
213            vVerif = true;////
214        }
215        
216        vSc.close();
217        }
218        catch(final FileNotFoundException pFNFE){
219            
220        }
221        
222        if(vVerif != false){
223            this.aGui.println("tests have succeded.");
224        }
225        else{
226            this.aGui.println("tests have failed.");
227        }
228    }//lecture()
229    
230        /**
231        *
232        * Retourne un booléen après traitement de la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
233        * @param pWord Commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
234        */
235       
236        public void interpretCommand(final String pWord){
237        this.aGui.println( "> " + pWord );
238        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand(pWord); 
239        
240        if(vCommand.isUnknown()) {
241            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean ?");
242            return;
243        }
244        
245        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
246    
247        if(vCommandWord.equals("help")){
248            this.printHelp();
249        }
250
251        else if(vCommandWord.equals("go")){
252            this.aRoomStack.push(this.aCurrentRoom);
253            this.goRoom(vCommand);
254        }
255        else if(vCommandWord.equals("look")){
256            this.look();
257        }
258        else if(vCommandWord.equals("eat")){
259            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
260                this.aGui.println("You can't do that");
261            }
262            else{
263            this.eat();
264        }
265        }
266        
267        else if(vCommandWord.equals("back")){
268            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
269                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
270            }
271            else{
272                this.back();
273            }
274        }
275        
276        else if (vCommandWord.equals("quit")){
277            if (vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
278                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
279            }
280            else{
281                this.endGame();
282            }
283        }
284        else if(vCommandWord.equals("test")){
285            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("essai")){
286                this.lecture("essai.txt");
287            }
288            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("victoire")){
289                this.lecture("victoire.txt");
290            }
291            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("court")){
292                this.lecture("court.txt");
293            }
294            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("all")){
295                this.lecture("all.txt");
296            }
297        }
298        else{
299            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
300        }
301    }//interpretCommand()
302    
303        /**
304    *
305    * Affiche le message d'aide.
306    */
307    private void printHelp(){
308    this.aGui.println("");
309    this.aGui.println("You are wandering around Nydia...");
310    this.aGui.println("If you lost your way, your command words are : ");
311    this.aGui.println("");
312    this.aGui.println(this.aParser.getCommandString());
313    }//printHelp()
314    
315    /**
316    *
317    * Permet de se déplacer entre les différentes pièces du jeu.
318    * @param pRoom pièce dans laquelle l'utilisateur veut se rendre
319    */
320   
321    private void goRoom(final Command pRoom){
322        Room vNextRoom = null;
323        String vDirection = pRoom.getSecondWord();
324        
325        if(!pRoom.hasSecondWord()){
326                this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
327                return;
328            }
329        vNextRoom = aCurrentRoom.getExit(vDirection);
330        
331        if(vNextRoom != null){
332            this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
333            this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
334            if(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null){
335                this.aGui.showImage(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName());
336            }
337        }
338        else if(vNextRoom == null){
339            this.aGui.println("There is no path!");
340            return;
341        }
342        else{
343            this.aGui.println("Unknown direction !");
344        }
345    } // Game
346    
347    /** Procédure d'arrêt du jeu.
348    */
349    private void endGame()
350    {
351        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
352        this.aGui.enable( false );
353    }
354
355}

005/**

011public class GameEngine
012{
013    private UserInterface aGui;
014    private Parser aParser;
015    private Room aCurrentRoom;
016    private Stack<Room> aRoomStack = new Stack<Room>();
017    
018    /**
019    * Constructeur du jeu où les pièces sont créées.
020    */
021    public GameEngine() {
022        createRooms();
023        this.aParser = new Parser();
024    }//GameEngine()

033        this.printWelcome();
034    }//setGUI()

039    *

043        this.aGui.showImage(aCurrentRoom.getImageName());
044    }//printLocationInfo()

181        /**
182        * Permet de revenir dans la salle précédente une fois la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
183        */
184    private void back(){
185        if(!this.aRoomStack.empty()){
186        this.aCurrentRoom = this.aRoomStack.pop();
187        this.printLocationInfo();
188        }
189        else{
190            this.aGui.println("You can't go back...");
191        return;
192        }
193    }//back()
194    
195        /**
196        *
197        * Retourne un booléen après traitement de la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
198        * @param pWord Commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
199        */
200       
201        public void interpretCommand(final String pWord){
202        this.aGui.println( "> " + pWord );
203        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand(pWord); 
204        
205        if(vCommand.isUnknown()) {
206            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean ?");
207            return;
208        }
209        
210        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
211    
212        if(vCommandWord.equals("help")){
213            this.printHelp();
214        }
215
216        else if(vCommandWord.equals("go")){
217            this.aRoomStack.push(this.aCurrentRoom);
218            this.goRoom(vCommand);
219        }
220        else if(vCommandWord.equals("look")){
221            this.look();
222        }
223        else if(vCommandWord.equals("eat")){
224            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
225                this.aGui.println("You can't do that");
226            }
227            else{
228            this.eat();
229        }
230        }
231        
232        else if(vCommandWord.equals("back")){
233            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
234                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
235            }
236            else{
237                this.back();
238            }
239        }
240        
241        else if (vCommandWord.equals("quit")){
242            if (vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
243                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
244            }
245            else{
246                this.endGame();
247            }
248        }
249        else{
250            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
251        }
252    }//interpretCommand()
253    
254        /**
255    *
256    * Affiche le message d'aide.
257    */
258    private void printHelp(){
259    this.aGui.println("");
260    this.aGui.println("You are wandering around Nydia...");
261    this.aGui.println("If you lost your way, your command words are : ");
262    this.aGui.println("");
263    this.aGui.println(this.aParser.getCommandString());
264    }//printHelp()
265    
266    /**
267    *
268    * Permet de se déplacer entre les différentes pièces du jeu.
269    * @param pRoom pièce dans laquelle l'utilisateur veut se rendre
270    */
271   
272    private void goRoom(final Command pRoom){
273        Room vNextRoom = null;
274        String vDirection = pRoom.getSecondWord();
275        
276        if(!pRoom.hasSecondWord()){
277                this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
278                return;
279            }
280        vNextRoom = aCurrentRoom.getExit(vDirection);
281        
282        if(vNextRoom != null){
283            this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
284            this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
285            if(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null){
286                this.aGui.showImage(this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName());
287            }
288        }
289        else if(vNextRoom == null){
290            this.aGui.println("There is no path!");
291            return;
292        }
293        else{
294            this.aGui.println("Unknown direction !");
295        }
296    } // Game
297    
298    /** Procédure d'arrêt du jeu.
299    */
300    private void endGame()
301    {
302        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
303        this.aGui.enable( false );
304    }

>>>>>>> 1e7e1828e02652f99302ecd1bbefe79cb14c42ec
